description.value: At 15th level, you raise water as per @Compendium[pf1.spells.7yf67b7y4byj96w7]{Control Water}, but no water need be present. This created water is stationary and does not flow out of the area where you create it; it lasts 1 round per sorcerer level and then disappears. At 20th level, the dimensions of the effect are doubled. You may use this ability once per day.
